shopping_cartMINffORT


Have you ever walked from Rosaline to Amul Canteen just to find out that it was closed?

Feels so bad, doesn’t it?

MINffORT, a Canteen Live Status Website, lets you check the canteen’s status, from the comfort of your couch.

Saves your hard-earned time and requires minimum effort, isn’t it?
